text: Lavaux was a district of the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. The capital was Cully. As of 2006 it is part of the Lavaux-Oron District. It contains the following municipalities: * Chexbres * Cully * Epesses * Forel * Grandvaux * Lutry * Puidoux * Riex * Rivaz * Saint-Saphorin * Savigny * Treytorrens * Villette == Other websites == * Pictures of Lavaux * Lavaux, pays aux trois soleils Category:Former districts of Vaud
title: Lavaux (district)
